本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Format: Face-to-face. The course will be conducted entirely in English. Students will be expected to participate actively in discussions, group work, and presentations. Students who take this class should have an interest in how people learn a second language. Please note that this is an introductory course and we are only going to learn about some basic ideas related to second language acquisition.

トピック.授業外学習2: Students will be expected to do homework every week including reading articles, writing summaries and researching and writing an essay.
